name: stephanie vines
text: My second visit in two weeks and same rude service. If you are talking with a customer you should never interrupt them to ring up another customer. The items are amazing but I refuse to go to a place where I can’t even finish my order because a “VIP” person walked in. It would be different if it were just a quick hand off and he pre-payed but not the case. I am stopped mid sentence and then have to wait for him to pay and then order something else. As though making items don’t already take 10-15 minutes. That makes my visit even longer as well as ruins my mood for the start of my morning. I’d rather go to a competitor across town. And I used to come few months ago and it was always great, quick service. Definitely not the same.

resp.text: Thank you for the compliment. Our items are amazing!! Sorry about your experience. Cheers!

name: Cori Sabir
text: The juice at the Juicery is awesome and fresh. They have such a unique approach to juicing and providing the freshest juice possible with the most nutrients. My husband and I have tasted several of their varieties with Just Beat it, Jalopeno Juice and The green Juice as our favorites. Every time I drink their juice I know that I'm getting an awesome surge of nutrients to my body. I feel great and can't wait to get my next juice fix. Only wish I lived closure and could go every day. Shout out to a great company with knowledgeable and reliable owners.

name: Preston Taylor
text: This place is amazing. Their juice is so good and authentic without all those bad preservatives. I highly recommend this place! Plus if you save your jars you'll gey 50 cents off your next purchase. Just an amazing place.

name: Mad Piper
text:
The juice really is great, but one trip here runs my family as much as it does to eat at Outback or Sakura Japanese Steakhouse!  I know the value of juicing but the thing getting juiced the most is my wallet.

September 2019:. Banner it front says the store is closing.

resp.text: Things are about to get much more affordable for everyone! Stay tuned... Big announcements coming out regarding how we are going to make juice more affordable for all!

name: Ethan Zibas
text: Fresh juice from a family owned company. The juice, and smoothies, are refreshing, nutritious, and taste delicious. What's not to love?

resp.text: We love you!!

name: Daniela Ferreira
text: They are serious about making you feel better through food here. Friendly and delicious!

name: Jacob Birmingham
text: The Juicery is a lifestyle change for me.  I love the location. I love the owners. I love the product. If you know me.  You will know why I love this so much!  The Juicery Press will change lives for the better.  I promise.

name: Matthew Henry
text: This is the only place I can still find plain, fresh carrot juice.

name: Theodis Barnes III
text: Nice staff, nice setting space, a bit pricey but you get what you pay for.

name: Ariel Marie
text: Love it!! The flu fighter is AMAZING! Not for the faint of heart but very wonderful ♥️♥️♥️

name: Roger Hill
text: Please show that your brick and mortar retail location is closed so u don't waste people's time driving out to your store.

name: Travis McDermott
text: You have to try these two juices. My professional opinion for digestive health would be "Daily Greens." My favorite juice is "Pucker Up." Great family owned business with a fantastic product!! Yum!!

name: John Palmer
text: The juice and the smoothies are only part of this amazing place. The owners are incredibly knowledgeable and passionate about  everything will be put out in their Juicery.

name: Joe JM
text: Great place! Got to try multiple drinks before picking, great staff, and great drink options!

name: Robert Crouch
text: Amazing juice and friendly service. They will let you try samples so you're not gambling on whether or not you'll like a drink, total added bonus.

name: Claire D
text: Fantastic place! Love it! I recommend the Hunnicutt juice and the Triple Chocolate smoothie. Soooo good!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review and we are so happy you loved it.  Can't wait to see you again.

name: Ashley Terral
text:
I just can't say enough positive things about this place, from the extremely helpful staff, to the
cleaniliness of the establishment, the awesome owners, and don't forget the best juice
EVER!

I used The Juicery as my main source of nutrition for a 25 day fast. I was desparately needing
healing on a cellular level in my gut. I ordered the juice every 3 days and I received my order
every time with little to no hiccups. The owners even left for vacation and were communicating
with me from paradise when I had questions.

Not to mention, juicing from home 4-5 times a day is so laborious and time consuming...

This is the fourth time I've done a juice fast for this long, but the first one I've done outside
of my home. This time was different. There was hardly any hunger, no crankiness or headaches.
I was able to sleep at night and I had amazing energy. Through this fast, I did lose 20 lbs in 20
days but that certainly was not the reason for doing it. The doctor wanted to put me on 20 days
of antibiotics. So, was this expensive? It wasn't cheap but it was an investment for my health
and much better for my body than taking so many antibiotics. I did see the doctor halfway through
and they were very impressed with the outcome and my vitals.

I even called them on the day I started back to solid foods because my  yoga teacher training graduating
class was celebrating at the Mexican restaurant. The Juicery made sure I had something raw and vegan and
healthy to take with me so I could be included in the celebration.

I've been off the fast for about ten days. I crave the juice like I wouldn't have ever imagined. Since
I came off, I've decided to be vegan and gluten free for a while and it's working wonderfully for me!

I truly believe that the fresh Almond Milk from The Juicery and the Cold Pressed juice changed my
life! I look forward to working with them in the future to help fulfill my juicing needs! Everyone who
works there is so helpful. I love the owners, the vision, and the concept. Thank you so much for
helping me to change my life, live a healthier lifestyle, and do it with ease!

name: Amber Clem
text: Love the staff but it can be a little pricey. I really love the wellness shots.

name: Caleb Knapp
text: I LOVE IT!!!!!  Usually I get a ginger shot, but the pucker up is amazing too!

name: Alyx Wright
text: Sweet lady up front helped me to try out the Juice. Wish they have one in Birmingham 😇

name: Amber Clem
text: Love the staff but it can be a little pricey. I really love the wellness shots.

name: sharpenedge
text: LOVE this stuff. It's pricey, but it's worth it. Quality drinks.

name: Theodis Barnes III
text: Nice staff, nice setting space, a bit pricey but you get what you pay for.

name: Matthew Henry
text: This is the only place I can still find plain, fresh carrot juice.

name: Alicia Tanner
text: Love the green sweetie!!!!

name: Debra Parker
text: Great

name: Benjamin Wireman
text: Awesome!!

name: Staci Shelton
text: Have been so many times but NOW they have the beer I love to drink... Platinum... Thanks guys.. the girls are awesome and I really appreciate their hard work... Great food, atmosphere and staff... Can't go wrong

name: Chris Lucas
text: We've been eating here as the time presents itself for a few years.  The food is consistently good and the service has always been outstanding.  I think we've tried everything on the menu but usually gravitate to the mahi.

name: Kellye Talley
text: Great food and atmosphere!  We like to ride over on the pontoon boat for lunch or dinner.

name: Steven Bell
text: Best steak in Birmingham area. I put it up there with Perry's steakhouse.

name: Austin
text: Great food! Friendly staff! Have been here over 10 times, always great!

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you for stopping in! We appreciate your business!

name: Kim sorrow
text: We eat here about 1 time a week and love it

name: Sissy Renee
text: I HAVE BEEN TO PARADISE POINT MARINA BEFORE ,BUT VISITED THE POINT RESTRAUNT THERE TODAY.THE RESTRAUNT WAS VERY CLEAN , HAD SIMPLE ,BUT TRENDY, DECOR .IT  HAD  SEVERAL TVS FOR VIEWING SPORTS. THEY HAVE BAR SEATING AND INDOOR AND OUTDOOR TABLES ,ALL WITH A PRETTY VIEW, OF THE LAKE.ALL EMPLOYEES  WORE MASKS , FOLLOWED DISTANCING  AND SEATING PROTOCOL. ALL OF THE EMPLOYEES ALSO GREETED US HOSPITABLY.OUR WAITRESS (SHE HAD NEON GREEN HAIR ,,AND WAS JUST AS CUTE, AS SHE WAS SWEET !) SHE ANSWERED ANY QUESTION ,AND ATTENDED ANY NEED WE HAD QUICKLY, AND KEPT OUR DRINKS FILLED, AS WELL .WE ORDERED THE FRIED DILL  PICKLE SLICES ,WITH HOMEMADE RANCH, AS AN APPETIZER. THEY WERE CRISPY FRIED, AND HAD A DELICIOUS SEASONED BATTER ,TOO. IN MOST PLACES ,THAT SERVE THESE SLICED PICKLES FRIED ,THEY'RE  SOFT.NOT HERE,THEY ARE FRIED PERFECTLY!HE ORDERED,THE GRILLED FISH AND SHRIMP BASKET ,WITH FRIES AND COLESLAW .IT WAS COOKED WELL ,AND TASTED GREAT.I ORDERED THE HOT WINGS (MANGO HABANERO).THEY WERE DELICIOUS, HAD HEAT ,WITH A HINT OF SWEETNESS.THEY WEREN'T ON THE MENU ,BUT I'M GLAD THE WAITRESS RECOMMENDED THEM ,TO ME ,AS THEY'RE NEW THERE..MARGARITAS WERE GOOD TOO.HAD A NiCE VISIT HERE TODAY. .WILL BE BACK, TO TRY MORE FOOD AND DRINKS THERE!THIS LIL' PLACE HAS A CASUAL,  COMFORTABLE FEELING.HAS A COMFORTABLE SETTING HERE.ENJOYED MY VISIT.

name: Shakia Crumbie
text:
THE VEGGIE!!! The entire service from start to finish was impeccable! I visited in the Grand Opening and was met with great service and delicious food! That Philly Cheese Melt left me speechless! It is my new favorite item from Chef Adyre! Also, those garlic, dill french fries...I could eat them by the bucket full!!

The vibe inside the cafe was amazing! Great energy, staff, and most importantly food!!

I have been back since and will be a life time customer!!

name: Hailley Tsm
text: Amazing!! I’m pregnant and been craving chicken nuggets (I’ve been vegan for 5 years) , this right here hit the spot. The Maple Mustard taste like a gourmet honey mustard and the quality of the food is amazing! I wasn’t expecting this from Huntsville, I come from Miami and I’ve been missing the flavor from there since personally everything is bland here. This is a must have!!

name: Joey Rogers
text:
Don't go too early, they might not have what you want ready (Sticky Orange Basket).  I ended up getting the Chickun Basket.  It was good, but a lot of fried food.   Also, Saturday is brunch only, not the full menu.

Update:  I had to lower my rating because the owner gave a snarky reply about fried food.  I was being pretty generous with my review because it was a new business, but the service was slow, and I would have order something less fried had they been able to provide what was on the menu.  I probably will never return now.

resp.text: The choice to order fried options is the customer’s own decision. If you don’t want something fried, there is an entire menu to choose from. Our menu clearly states that brunch is offered on Saturday’s. This is an option for the city’s plant based consumers to enjoy something different, not a reason for a negative comment. Best wishes!

name: Davida Holiday
text:
I’m sorely disappointed with The Veggie. I had high expectations. There was a long wait, but I was not upset about that, after all it was their grand opening. BUT after waiting an hour and a half for our meals, mine was subpar.

First the good: The prices are really reasonable. The staff was super friendly! The atmosphere is inviting and bright, though a tad smoky. The lemonade was fantastic, we got a charcoal and a mango ginger. My daughter got the Philly and it was really good.

Now the bad: After waiting an hour and a half, the fries were cold. I definitely wasn’t expecting that. I ordered the chikn strips. There was more breading than oyster mushrooms. The menu stays you get EIGHT slices, I’d be lucky if I got TWO. The rest was breading or mushrooms that were cooked so hard you couldn’t eat them. They too were cold. We bought 4 cookies at the register and they were undercooked.

I understand that they were super slammed, but I would have expected they still put their best foot forward on opening day as well as after having people wait so long.

PICTURES OF EVERYTHING ATTACHED.

resp.text: Thank you for coming into the Cafe today! While we acknowledge your  disappointment & apologize for any inconveniences, we had a staff of 3 food preparers, including the Chef & Owner, ensuring everyone had fair & accurate portions & your order has been the only order that was reported as less than the amount advertised. Also, our cookies are not made in house by The Veggie - they are made by an outside Bakery Company, but we will pass along your sentiments as well. That was also the only complaint we received about the quality of the cookies today. Despite serving over 300 items today, quality is our top priority. We invite you to come back to the Cafe in the future & appreciate your being part of our Grand Opening & first day in business in our space!

name: King Marq
text:
I visited The Veggie on yesterday and was BLOWN away! From the clean airy atmosphere to the whimsical color detail it’s definitely a must visit location. We don’t have too many vegan options in the area, so a new one is always welcomed! I initially ordered the Vegan Shrimp po-boy with the garlic parsley fries. My order was made fresh and arrived very quickly much to my delight! The po-boy was awesome and overflowing with spicy deliciousness and the fries were enough to make me place a second order!
In my second order I got the chickun which turned out to be fried oyster mushrooms and they were seasoned and breaded to perfection (they even gave me more than expected)! And the fries again, can’t complain!
I will ABSOLUTELY be returning Very soon! Give this place a try, u won’t be disappointed!! 👍🏽

resp.text: Thanks for giving us a try Marq!! We’re glad you enjoyed a variety of dishes and look forward to serving you again!

name: samir fields
text: The Philly Cheesesteak was PHENOMENAL. I’ll definitely be back several times. No question.

name: Melanie Holton
text: I'd been wanting to try this place for ages and finally did. It was delicious. I got the jackfruit bbq wrap and the ginger mango lemonade. The wrap came with chips which I usually don't care for but these were seasoned and super tasty. Very cute environment and nice staff as well. I will definitely be back.

name: Kimberly Sax
text: I ordered The Supreme, super good but the crust was completely burnt.:( I had to throw over half away; I even brought it home to try and use my good knife but that also didn't help. I've had several good experiences here; we especially love the brunch boxes and cinnamon rolls! I recommend going here but just wanted to let you know that maybe make sure not to overcook that next time.

name: Jessica Temple
text: Yum, yum yum! I've been a fan of The Veggie as a food truck, and I'm happy that they now have an all-the-time location. I got The Veggie wrap to go. It was delicious, light but filling, and prepared very quickly. I was in and out in less than 10 minutes. I also LOVE her cinnamon rolls. They are perfect.

name: joann coleman
text: The bowl was absolutely delicious and very filling. Right after eating i immediately call my bestfriend and told her she has to try it out.I am definitely getting the meal preps. i recommend to anyone who is just starting to transition to vegan and none vegan ones who just want great food

name: Nicole Haughton
text: Had the crab cake sandwich and it was delicious! I was a little skeptical of what the flavor and texture would be like but it was better than I expected.  Also picked up some of the black eye pea salad! Insider tip: Get the big one! You ll thank me later.  It’s fresh abs crisp, with the right amount of acid.  It’s my favorite late night snack. Kudos to the chef for serving the vegan community for the past  three years!  Cant wait for the brunch so I can get some more cinnamon rolls!

resp.text: Thanks Nicole! We’ve appreciated the opportunity to serve you over the years and thank you for visiting our new space!

name: Ellen George
text: So excited to finally have a vegan restaurant in town! The service was great and the food was delicious, especially the vegan ranch! 😍 FYI you do still have to wear a mask inside even if you are vaccinated.

name: RoJay Armstead
text: This will absolutely be THE spot for everything Vegan!! Absolutely love the Mango Ginger Lemonade and Charcoal Lemonade! The Philly Cheese Melt is absolute top notch! I also had the Jackfruit BBQ Wrap which was pretty good. All food was made fresh to order so expect a short wait, but that will be the least of your worries supporting this cafe!! KUDOS and CONGRATS on such a great spot!! Very inviting and I will be back again and again!

resp.text: Thanks so much RoJay, we look forward to serving you again!!!

name: ilike mylife
text: i came here for a nice vegan meal because i love vegetables so much & i waited over 1.5hrs for my veggies & the owner threatened my life when i asked for a refund! she told me i can leave or stay & be used as her target practice! if this is where you want to go for your last supper, you have the right place. BE CAREFUL MY VEGAN FRIENDS

name: Angela Whitlock
text:
I placed an order for pick up and was told that it would be ready on the day I selected from the website. When the day came to pick up the order, I called the restaurant before leaving my house to make sure they were ready. Over the phone, the staff informed me that they canceled my order and the food would not be ready that day. This was very frustrating to me because I never received any notification that the order was canceled. For two days I was excited to have the food in time for Mothers' Day to enjoy with my family. Had I decided to go up there without calling first, it would have been an additional frustration as it would have been a waste of time, gas and money. The restaurant didn't even offer to give me any type of credit for the inconvenience. They really need to fix their online ordering process and/or the communication of it with the Square company. This has really put a damper on this holiday :-(

Update: I was never charged for this order. I was simply hoping for a small credit or discount as a courtesy for the website error in telling me that my order would be ready on that day, when it wouldn't be. However, the owner is rude and paranoid. She even banned me from ever ordering food from her restaurant just because I posted the above review. I tried to find common ground with her, but she would not compromise. She has a problem taking ownership of things she can control (ie. the website checkout option). I wish her and her restaurant the best, but if she doesn't listen to her customers, I doubt it will get any better.

resp.text: This customer attempted to order items not available on Saturday’s. A full refund was issued when the order was cancelled and the business does not owe the customer any additional credits as the review seems to falsely imply. We encourage you to read our menu and social postings carefully to properly set expectations. Since you’ve publicly bashed our business multiple times, perhaps other services in the area will better fit your needs. Thanks!

name: Kara Stokes
text: LOVE The Veggie!!! If you’re in the area and you’re vegan, curious about vegan food or just looking for an alternative to fast food/meat options, just try it. You can’t go wrong!!! Will be back!

name: Google User
text: First time visit. Also my very first time eating vegan food & was so delicious! Will be back

name: Steven Jamison
text: Helpful and friendly staff. The food was incredible, would highly recommend to anyone wanting a vegan meal.

name: Samar Misra
text: I loved the meal I got from the Veggie yesterday and loved the nice, personable convos with the two male staff at the counter!  I was able to say hi to Chef Adyre in the back who remembers me from before and I recall our nice, personable exchanges from before, though I figure she seemed really busy in the back yesterday which is probably the reason for not being able to talk further and hopefully next time such can happen when possible as  warm, personable convos and exchanges from all staff anywhere is what stands out to me the most and I see as important.

name: Ken Veal
text: Great experience...it was my first time trying vegan food and I loved it. You won’t be disappointed.

name: Bethany Graham
text: Huntsville has been dying for a vegan cafe/ restaurant. The Veggie is an absolute gem. The grand opening was just last week, so obviously the place was so busy! It was AMAZING! I wasn’t even upset for a little longer wait time. I went twice last week. The grab and go section was super handy on the day I went for a quick lunch. The staff was extremely friendly despite being overrun with customers. The Philly Patty Melt, the Jackfruit BBQ wrap and Impossible Bowl are just a few of my favorites so far. And don’t get me started on the cinnamon rolls! You absolutely must try them. I’ve had several flavors over the past few years. Every single flavor variation has been out of this world! Kudos to Chef Adyre for opening a welcoming space for vegans and non-vegans alike! The atmosphere is great and the food is even better! You definitely have a lifelong customer in me!

name: Ashley Gizas
text: I was really disappointed. I really, really wanted to love the Veggie, and was excited about Huntsville getting a vegan restaurant. That being said, I waited 2 hours for my lunch. I don't know if it's that they need a larger kitchen staff or if someone didn't show up, but 2 hours is how long I account for having lunch at a high end restaurant, not a quick service place.

name: christin moore
text:
I’ve been to The Veggie about three times now since it has opened and I plan to continue to go. Today I went and had to wait longer than before however that is expected when the number of orders are high. The food is absolutely amazing so it’s expected to see a long line and have to wait a while until the food is ready. What I saw today was professionalism at it’s finest. The staff were patient with the customers and they worked hard and fast to get everyone’s food out. Today I tried the BBQ Jackfruit Wrap and it was absolutely amazing. Please do not get discouraged to come and eat at The Veggie all because of wait times because all restaurants have wait times so just bare with the staff and chef because from what I saw today, they really were doing the best that could do and the food is always fresh and made to order. When food is made fresh and made to order , then of course it’s gonna take some time ! Anyway, I will definitely continue to go to The Veggie and spread the word to others. To The Veggie staff, owner and chef, JOB WELL DONE and keep up the good work ❤️❤️❤️

-

name: poochyena
text: With my parents and we each got the burger. Took at least 45 minutes for us to get our order, but it tasted very good. Expect to be there for a while if you go.

name: Kimberly Zoot Holmes
text: The whole experience is 5-stars! From the excellent menu options to the location to the service. You can get a quick vegan meal and then peruse art studios and galleries at Lowe Mill.

resp.text: Thanks Kim!! We’ve appreciated the opportunity to serve you over the years!

name: NieCourt Williams
text: I was super excited about The Veggie cafe opening up. I had had the sweet potato cinnamon rolls and lemonade in the past, so couldn’t wait to try the other items. The first time I went to the cafe, I picked out a lemonade and jackfruit “chicken” salad. It was absolutely delicious. I loved the fact that you can pop in, grab from the cooler, pay, and leave if you are crunched for time. The second time I went, I placed an order for myself (chikun basket, fries, and maple mustard dipping sauce ) and a coworker (crab less cake Sammy) online. We went to pick it up and only had to wait for a few minutes, the staff was polite as well. I’m not even vegetarian but this place doesn’t make me miss meat!! I don’t even like mushrooms but you wouldn’t be able to tell by the way I ate those oyster mushroom strips lol, they were THAT good!!! It’s proof that your food doesn’t have to be boring and flavorless just because there is no meat! My coworker has been vegetarian for 7 years and had heard about the veggie but never tried it. She loved the food as well and can’t wait to bring her husband back for brunch!! Whether you are a full on vegetarian, or trying to become one, or even if you have no plans to leave meat alone, it doesn’t matter, you will absolutely love The Veggie!!! Can’t wait to go back!!!!

name: Kyle Roden
text: Ordered 3 sandwiches (half the menu was marked out). Waited 30+ minutes despite the restaurant being pretty empty. The impossible burger was great. The other two sandwiches came on some terrible bread (dry, not tasty, sandwich was falling apart).  It will probably be a while before I give them another shot.

name: Tyra Smith
text: Had a 45 minute wait for ‘The Cluckster’ and when I got it, it was cold the pickle juice had soften the bread and there was black hair on my pickles. Other than those things the food was good the mango ginger lemonade is a hit.

name: Biowar
text: The Pimento cheese crunch wrap was wonderful as well as the charcoal lemonade & the mango ginger. Will be back for more <333

name: susan glandon
text: I love the whole menu. Great food for people who are serious about their good  health!

resp.text: Thanks Susan!

name: Dallas Parker
text: I’ve never eaten a burger and felt so great after. This plant-based thing might not be so bad! Lol great food, great atmosphere. Looking forward to returning soon!

resp.text: Thanks Dallas!!!

name: Ashley Joy
text:
The food was AMAZING! Staff was professional, and the Chef when she wasn’t busy came around to greet everyone.

I will be back, and I also will tell everyone to visit!

resp.text: Thanks Ashley!!!

name: Amy L
text:
I would love to give this place more stars, but after waiting an hour for our  food I had to leave and request my money back.

The food on the menu looks great but a little pricey.
The young lady behind the counter seemed nice and she apologized for the delay, but that did not help the fact that we did not get the food, or so much as a glance from the cook staff, who appeared to be in no particular hurry.

Oh well I guess there is always next time, I wish them luck.

name: Lethesia Southard
text: I usually dont leave food review but The Veggie left me absolutely wow'd! My husband and I visited Saturday, we had the brunch box. It was most definitely worth the money! The staff was so kind and service was quick. My husband who is a meat eater has been increasingly opened to the vegan lifestyle thanks to Chef Adyre and The Veggie. I cant wait to come back! This is a great addition to the city of Huntsville. Good Job everyone!

name: Scarlet Maze
text: Absolutely loved the food and atmosphere!! The drinks are all hand made and taste amazing. You must get all the lemonades!

name: remy cotton
text: I have been there numerous times, and tried different items on their. Every time the food is incredibly delicious

resp.text: Thank you Remy we enjoy serving you every time!

name: Dessica Coleman
text: Wow...this was THE BEST food I’ve had in a while...not to mention best vegan food I’ve ever had. There are so many delicious options to choose from, you will not be disappointed. The crabless cake sandwich and philly patty melt are incredible, and paired perfectly with the most delicious fries I’ve ever had. I wish I could give 10 stars, because even our picky 8 yr old enjoyed the Chickun Basket so much that she thought it was actual chicken. I cannot wait to eat The Veggie again!

name: Sallie Keene
text: I’m not Vegan but absolutely love The Veggie! The cinnamon rolls are amazing! The new cafe is wonderful and full of delicious menu items, including a jackfruit bbq wrap that makes you say “Wow!”

resp.text: Thanks Sallie!!!

name: desire vernon
text: Overpriced small portions! Owner is rude and nasty. And bad business hours also half the menu was not available

name: Linda Wills
text: The service is terribly slow here. Waited about 1 1/2 hours for 2 meals. It doesn't matter if the food is wonderful. I can get good food in other places. Don't come here on your lunch hour, because you won't have time to eat.

name: Tyree Jennings
text: Ordered the Philly steak and Buffalo po boy. Some of the best food I've ever had!

name: Carol Mills
text: The food was great, however, the customer service was very poor .

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! If you would to provide us with more specific feedback to ensure a favorable experience at our cafe in the future, feel free to email us at Biz@EatTheVeggie.com - thank you!

name: Yoni Stuff
text: Awesome food...I’m so full I’m about to pop

name: The Hair Doula (Dasha Shaw)
text:
I had the Philly cheesesteak and the chickun strips. The cheesesteak was good although not quite what I was expecting. It was basically an impossible burger patty on toasted sandwich bread, and the vegan cheese they used was slimy (I think it was daiya, but I am not sure). If you are like me and don’t like the slimy vegan cheeses, you may want to avoid dishes with cheese. I was expecting there to be more mushrooms in the chickun strips. The crispness was great, but it was pretty much all crispness and almost no mushroom. My fries were also cold which was a huge bummer as well because it seems like the fries are made fresh in house and I could tell that they would be super tasty if they were hot!

The lemonade was DELICIOUS! That was honestly my favorite part of the entire experience.

As someone who has been to many places and tried many many vegan restaurants, I was hoping for a bit more in terms of the quality.

I already saw a response to another not-so-perfect review, and the response was passive aggressive and condescending, so that also made me a little disappointed and also confused because everyone in the actual store seemed so kind. I’m bracing fir that kind of response as well, but I feel like being direct and being honest is the highest form of love... it shows that you believe in someone’s ability to be better because you see more in them.

I am glad that there is another vegan restaurant in Huntsville, and I hope y’all continue to grow and get better! Definitely rooting for y’all!

name: Jaime E.
text: The best fries I've ever had! Quick and friendly staff, too!

resp.text: Thanks so much Jaime!!!

name: Kendra Leslie
text: The food was so good and filling and the workers were really nice! Definitely recommend and can’t wait to spend so much money on this place!

resp.text: Thanks so much Kendra!!

name: Doug Shelton
text: A little plain on the inside, but they have delicious food, guilt free.  The loaded potatoes were super!

name: Ebony Lashay
text: All I'm saying.... They are the bomb.com🤷🏿‍♀

resp.text: Thanks Ebony!

name: Flowz Da Flowa
text: Food is great...

name: JoAnna Butler
text: Variety of delicious meals available in different packages. Gives me one less reason to be running around town.

resp.text: Thanks JoAnna! We hope to see you at our new location in the near future!

name: Chance
text: The Cluckster 😍😍😍

name: Kristi Tahada
text:
I'll admit, I came in hungry and tired so I had a bit of a funky mood when I realized my only option was tacos (no you can't just order any or all of the amazing food you see in these pics. Check the website to find out what the one daily menu item is. Yes, just one.) The shells, cheese, and sour cream were store bought, possibly also the salsa and black beans. On top of that I was going to have to IKEA these tacos from the mountain of individual plastic containers and wraps in which it came disassembled.

I was ranting and raving the whole way home to my friend about how I was hungry and now had to wait to eat, and I was sure these dinky portions weren't going to be enough for four tacos. But I was hungry so when I got home I did start assembling and, for all my fussing, I must admit the tacos were good. I finished every bite, everything just stretched, and while I wasn't stuffed, I was satisfied.

I don't know that I'd go again because I do feel that this was something I could have made myself since the majority of the ingredients can be bought straight off the shelf. I'm also not a fan of single use plastic (horrible for the environment) and this meal came with A LOT! But the food is good, the prices are reasonable, and the service is decent.

resp.text:
Hi,

I’m glad you enjoyed the food. We give the option of having everything assembled, but the issue is with the hard shells. They get soggy. We’re planning to upgrade our equipment & materials, and renovate our place. We are working on being environmentally friendly. We have a donation drive currently going on, on our website www.orderhhk.com.

We would love to offer more meals for each day that we’re open, but we only have one chef, that’s the cook, prep cook and has a host of other jobs. As we get staff that can fulfill these positions we will offer more meals for every day that we’re open.

Taco Tuesday is a basic meal. The beans are slow cooked, we have switched to homemade sour cream, but we offer non tree-nut sour cream as well. We have been at our first location for four months and we’re improving, so with a little time we will be a beacon in the community and a stellar business. Thank you for your review!

name: Davida Holiday
text: Good vegan food, great lemonade, and super friendly owner!!! We got the chikn sandwich and potato wedges and loved them! I’m eager to try more!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!! I'm so glad you enjoyed the food.

name: Joe Dean
text: Super nice people! Emanuel and Ashley are awesome! We had the “chicken sandwiches” and they were delicious and HUGE! Great food and great service. We will definitely be back soon!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! I’m glad you enjoyed the food!

name: Monique Watts
text: The food here is Awsome! The vegan oxtails were so delicious. Thank you Heaven's Healthy Kitchen. If your in the area, check them out! You won't be disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! You are so welcomed. I’m glad you enjoyed the food and thanks for the plug!

name: Rocket City Eats
text: We found out about Heavens Healthy Kitchen on Instagram and decided to give it a try as we were looking for ways to reduce our cholesterol. We tried one of his fried chicken sandwiches made from wheat gluten and it was absolutely delicious. The flavor and texture of the sandwich made it easy to accept this meat substitute as we are not vegans. This sandwich was paired with some heavenly mashed potatoes. It is great to see more vegan friendly meals here in the Rocket City!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I'm glad you enjoyed it.

name: Ty
text: I'm a student at the University of Alabama A&M. I tried Heaven's Healthy Kitchen to get a feel for other vegan food in Huntsville and it was great. I ordered the Mexican Bowl and the Raspberry Alkaline Lemonade. The Bowl was flavorful with a small spicy twang to it. This biggest thing for me is that I didn't feel heavy after eating the it. The lemonade is so so good, I didn't even mind the pulp on the inside. Didn't taste sugary or anything it was so fresh!!!! He was great with the delivery on campus. The only thing I would change is the order process through paypal. If apple pay or cash app was accepted I would feel a little bit more comfortable making a purchase but I def will order again. Hope to see them on grubhub or door dash soon

resp.text: Hey Ty. How are you? You were a faithful customer when you attended A&M. Thank you for the support and patronage! I wish you nothing but success in all your endeavors. By the way I have Cashapp, Zelle, Venmo, Apple Pay, Google Pay and I'm joining forces with  Uber Eats in a week or two ;)

name: Angela Whitlock
text:
I was fortunate to find Heaven's Healthy Kitchen in time for the holidays. I found the food to be slightly above average. I ordered mac and cheese, cornbread dressing and banana nut bread. I enjoyed all of the side dishes. However the mac and cheese and dressing was a bit too seasoned/salty for my taste. Also, I believe the mac and cheese contained turmeric. The turmeric color stained the brackets on my ceramic braces and I could not finish it. I hope he can list the main ingredients of each dish so customers are aware upfront (also for those allergic to certain ingredients). My mom is sensitive to spicy foods and there was something spicy in the mac and cheese that burned her mouth. The banana nut bread (my favorite item) was delicious, but just very heavy. You could only eat like a slice and feel super full. It is not easy to find vegan dishes during the holidays though, so I'm glad the chef was able to accommodate my request.

Update: I raised my rating from 3 stars to 4 stars because of the great customer service. Chef offered me a free meal and was very conversational and makes you feel welcome. He truly cares about his food and his customers and I think his business will excel because of that.

resp.text: Hi. I’m so sorry the food was not up to the standards that they are today. I have since changed the recipe for the Mac n cheese and I apologize for the inconvenience. If you’re ever in town again there’s a free meal on me.

name: Brandon Lucas
text: Everything was great.

resp.text: Thank you Brandon!

text: Would love to try to food but there is no answer when I call and it says there open , also no location for the GPS .. unprofessional how can I enjoy a Buisness I can’t get to

resp.text: I'm so sorry you experienced this inconvenience, I'm not for sure why you couldn't get through, but let me know when you come to visit and there is a free drink on me :)

name: Alisha Miles
text: Delicious doesn't begin to describe the food. We ordered lunch and dinner to-go as we were passing through the town. The Kale wrap and Jack fruit BBQ sandwich are our top picks. Not only does this place offer amazing food, they are in this specific location to give back to their home community by offering healthy food. A great mission accompanied by delicious food and awesome service. I will be back soon even if I have to drive out of the way.... I may even plan a trip just to eat here again!

name: Duzle
text: The café itself is quaint and chill, and the lady who runs it is charming and lively! Street parking. The location is within their home community, to which they wish to give back by providing a healthy alternative such as this. I had the "millionaire 'burger'" along with sweet potato fries - quite tasty! It was piled high with veggies, avocado, and other add-ons. The burger look and texture was great. As usual with meat substitutes, you must treat it as a new kind of "meat" rather than compare it to actual beef. If you do this and let it stand on its own, this burger (along with other substitutes) tastes great. Next time I'm here, I want to try the jackfruit "pulled pork" and possibly a smoothie. This was my first vegan restaurant experience and it was quite lovely! Highly recommended for those hesitant on exploring this new type of cuisine.

name: Raisa Long
text: I've been here twice and each time was a pleasant experience. If you are in a rush, call in your order. The Happy Feelings Tropical Good Smoothie is the best. I've also tried the pulled pork sandwich which was surprisingly good if you're not vegan. Check them out for good healthy food.

name: Ellis
text: Very nice and welcoming people! Ordered previously through Grubhub and decided to go in store this time to order. Went to order cookies and left out with cookies and some cupcakes. I HIGHLY recommend!

name: Xena Saunders
text: It’s hard finding vegan food that’s well seasoned and flavorful, but by God this food was amazing. Seasoned perfectly- THE FLAVOR WAS IMMACULATE!! Not only was the food delicious, but the owner was such a sweet heart when we went to grab our food. We will definitely be back!!! Thank you so much!!!

name: Isabel Chen
text: My husband and I aren't vegan, but when we feel like our bodies need a "reset" we seek out vegan, vegetarian, or raw food. This place is a wonderful. Food was fresh and flavorful. We will be back for more.

name: Eddie Marroquin
text: Friendly atmosphere. Zen burger was epic! Never had anything like it. Jackfruit burrito was tasty. Kids chicken strips were delicious. Highly recommend.

name: Yakwanza Bantu
text:
Ate there one time...and kept going back, just being there makes you want to eat healthy....the environment is soothing, relaxing ,while you wait there's  great music playing  and the services is top shelf...wow.
Keep up the great work.

name: Sophia S
text: An amazing meal that will leave you smiling inside and out. We loved the fully loaded garden brat and whose health wouldn’t feel enriched while eating the millionaire’s burger! Great find and a very thoughtful and kind owner!

text: Delicious food! I got the jackfruit sandwich and sweet potato fries. And chocolate chip cookies. The sauce that came with the fries was amazing! Good variety of menu options, really nice owner. Delicious cookies, I wish I’d bought more :) Thanks for a delicious meal!

text: After learning about this place from a friend, I had to try it out. I had the black bean burger and I have to say. It was the best burger I've had in a long time. The taste was out of this world! Also, the service was superb. I will be returning and I definitely recommend!

resp.text: Liberty Black Bean or Purple Black Bean are definitely to be considered!

text: The food was very good! He was very nice and helpful while I was deciding what to order. I went with the burger and it was delicious! The food exceeded expectations and I will undoubtedly be returning. We're going to link back up and develop a meal plan and I'm going to eat Good Food To Be Hail for a week!

name: Timothy Casey
text: I cut meat out of my diet 7 days ago and never had a veggie burger before but I ordered the millionaire combo and it was fantastic! I know now that this will be a lot easier. David was very nice and helped me out on what to order knowing I was a beginner.

resp.text: Millionaires and Zen burgers are dynamic opportunities!

name: Aiden Shannon
text: Tried this spot already with a friend and I am hooked since then. I love the great vibes and delicious dishes and beverages. Keep up the good work.

text: WOAH! What a disappointment... if you have no appetite or you eat like fashion model. This might be good. Portions are small *like half of a sandwich... and there "large" is like a medium anywhere else I have been.  Their fruit bowls look large but, I didn't get that.  I got a piddly bit for quite a lot.

resp.text: Hey Tim, very sorry you had a bad experience. As you can imagine sourcing all organic premium ingredients can be expensive. Hopefully you’ll give us another shot to make it right. Thanks for the feedback.

name: Lee Reese
text: Lovely little juice bar with a great menu of healthy, organic foods, smoothies and juices. The staff is super friendly and helped my make a good choice since it was my first time. Indoor and outdoor seating available and they have an app so you can order on the go.

name: Christine Golab
text: Protein toast was ON POINT! Also love the salads and all the juices and milks! I would love to add a photo, but I ate it too fast 😁

resp.text: Hey Christine, glad you liked it!

name: Nicole Havel
text:
I will say the food is delicious and clean and the juices are great. The building is spotless, and the workers are nice.
However, I asked for both my juices to be light ice or no ice (I don’t like ice). I proceeded to be charged $5.50 more for each juice, totaling $14.25 per juice. I had ordered two juices and a toast, and, with a 25% tip, my total came out to $50. I was like excuse me? I asked for a receipt and was like there’s no way I’m paying $5.50 extra each drink for asking for light ice/no ice. Just give me less juice. So ultimately I had to ask for a refund. $8.75 is a lot for a juice to begin with so to put it bluntly don’t come here on a budget.
I cook solely organic / grass fed / free range food. I know the costs are higher, but not that high. This place is a racket.

resp.text: Hey Nicole, we’re glad you like the food and the shop. As you know, premium organic food is expensive to source but it is the best for your health. Thanks for the feedback about extra juice pricing. Unfortunately that is what it costs us. I’ll be sure to reiterate with our team to make sure guests know there’s an added cost for that.

name: William Brend
text: Absolutely fresh and delicious!!  Definitely recommend the Hardcore One if you love your veggies in a juice.

resp.text: Thanks! Glad you liked it!!

name: b H
text: I’ve had a pleasant experience each time I’ve visited the Greystone location. The interaction was very minimal but nice enough. I’m definitely hooked and have decided to make Clean Juice a part of my daily routine.

name: Lorenzo Carter
text: Im sad to complain that today was the first bad experience I've had at Clean Juice. I reported the incident to the manager Savanah, to no avail. Usually when entering the store its very pleasant and warm. Today when I came in it was very different. The lady at the register appeared to be annoyed and upset. She never asked if she could help me, she didn't speak, no smile or anything. She didn't say anything to me until I asked her a question about the menu. I don't know her name but she stood out to me because she was the only tall black young lady working. I told the manager it was frustrating to me because being a black man myself, i didn't expect to be treated that way by her. I have always been treated so nice and warm any other time I come in the store. I have written the corporate office and will follow up with them as soon as possible because after talking to the manager Savanah she let me know that her friendship with her employee was very strong...which let me know that I should not hold my breath for an apology.

name: Jennifer Pidgeon
text: Today was my first visit to Clean Juice off 280.  I had the Longevity One smoothie, and it was really good and filling.  I bought some cold-pressed juices that I can't wait to try.  The staff was friendly and knowledge about the ingredients and health benefits.  I'm looking forward to trying the Greenoa Bowls, wraps, and toasts.  I will definitely go back and do recommend it.

resp.text: Hey thanks for coming in! Glad you liked it. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Amy Farren
text: I got "The Spring One" smoothie, and it tasted like frozen water essentially. I thought I was getting Covid or something when I tried it, because there was no taste. Then I tried my son's Berry Bowl, and it was delicious. I have no problem paying high prices for organic food, but I would for it to at least taste good. I guess I just won't ever order their smoothies and stick to the acai bowls.

name: Ann Elizabeth Moore
text: I loved Clean Juice from the moment we stepped inside! The atmosphere is great. The juices and smoothies are stellar. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Hey Ann, thanks for the kind words.

name: Melyssa Boggan
text: Great atmosphere 😄 everyone is kind and seemed very friendly. Love the music playing. Everything looked so fresh (fruits and veggies). Juice and smoothie were delicious!!!

resp.text: Thanks Melyssa! Glad you liked it.

name: Jessica Hose
text: The store was immaculate and love the worship music playing. The girls were so sweet and made our product perfect! Thank God for a truly healthy food in Greystone. I will be back for sure!

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!!

name: David Aaron Sheetz
text: DO NOT GO HERE IF YOU VALUE COVID-19 PRECAUTIONS. First I'll start with saying they have a sign that specifically asks for Yelp and Google reviews so here you go! The two employees working were both maskless this specific time I visited Clean Juice. I have been here on and off throughout the pandemic and have seen masks being worn sometimes and not others...Why can't this place enforce the ONE THING that scientists have PROVEN is effective? Why can't they stay consistent with their policies? This is grade A poor business management. Also there is a statewide mandate still active. USE LOGIC AND REASON OR LOSE MY BUSINESS. Food is great, don't kill your business by failing your employees and customers.

resp.text:
Hey David,
Our policy is for employees to wear masks. We will continue to have this policy until the governor drops the mandate. Thanks for feedback.

name: Dawn Willett
text: The coffee smoothie was delicious. The staff is very friendly.

resp.text: Thanks Dawn!

name: Michael Johnson
text: Amazing atmosphere every time I come in. The staff is always friendly and professional! I have told all of my friends and coworker about Clean Juice!!!

resp.text: Thank you! We’re happy to serve.

name: Steven Mooney
text: Friendly staff and delicious smoothies and juices.  I didn't try the food, but The Coffee One and The Intense One were both great.

resp.text: Thanks! Glad you enjoyed it!!

name: Satin Touch Experience
text: You better be ready for those shots oh my they help clean you out

name: Vinny
text: Their product is excellent, but pricey.  They are limiting their potential with a lot of the “in your face” religious stuff scattered throughout the store.  This is off-putting to a lot of people and getting even more so.   The employees are very nice and friendly, the store is immaculate and the product is great.  If they make it more middle of the road, (No “hey, look at me I’m a Christian” and some $5 or less options, customers would be lined up out the door.

name: Max Messer
text: I have had nothing but fantastic experiences at this location! The management is wonderful and always so friendly and welcoming. They remember my order and always suggest the best things on the menu with a great knowledge of all of the ingredients. I will definitely be coming back here as a regular!

name: Dr. Rebecca Warren
text: Just drove by here on a trip back home and we had such a great experience! The team of women working were so nice and very attentive. We appreciated their patience as I asked for multiple things out of the ordinary. Will be back!

name: Melissa McCollum
text: Love the smoothies and the customer service is excellent!

resp.text: Thanks Melissa!

name: Savannah Irwin
text: I love the atmosphere at Clean Juice. The staff and team at this location know how to make their guests feel welcome. The quality of the products is set apart, as well as the quality of the service provided. Love this store!!

name: Natalya Drake
text: Great customer service, amazing drinks, I’m so thankful I live close to them.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! Glad you enjoyed it.

name: Shaundra Hudson
text: Love this place.  I literally used to drive to Huntsville, Al to get my juice cleanses.  So excited they are down the street. Juices are fresh and staff is amazing.  You cannot go wrong here, everything is healthy and organic.

resp.text: Hello Sha, we used to drive to Huntsville and Atlanta weekly too!! Now we have great juice right in our back yard. Thanks for the kind words and valuable feedback.

name: Richard Baxter
text: Our new favorite place! Organic and healthy juices and meals, a great atmosphere and friendly people, and a strong mission to bring health and wellness to their customers. Our whole family including the kids love their juices and smoothies and bowls. We will make this a regular stop during our week!

resp.text: Hello Richard, Thanks so much for your kind words! We're so glad to be part of the community and provide a healthy option to our area. Look forward to seeing you and your family!

name: Megan Hudson
text: hands down the best place to work💛 (and eat! can’t go wrong with anything!)

name: Troy Gigis
text: My family and I are so happy that you all are open. Your staff made a big difference in my experience. Everyone was so eager to help and kind. We love the cold press juices and your smoothies are excellent. We will keep coming back.

resp.text: Hey Troy, Thanks so much for coming in! So glad our team made you feel welcome, they are awesome. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Alisa Poole
text: Love love love your food and juices!!!

resp.text: Thanks Alisa! Glad you like it.

name: Nicholas Gregory
text: Wow what a staff! First time here, walked me through everything and gave recommendations. The owner of this location is very lucky to have this level of employees.

name: Marissa Miller
text: Had been a few times before the pandemic and the manager always was able to help me and describe why certain things are good for me and helped me greatly with learning what to put into my body. He always made good conversation and made me feel important and like they cared about my health. I came back the other day after learning they reopened and had a horrible experience. I asked about nutritional benefits and differences in proteins and they just tried to hand me a nutritional pamphlet and could not answer any specific questions about their products . I asked to speak to the man I normally spoke to and that he was the manager and I couldn’t remember his name.I was informed he was fired and I was talking to one of the managers who took his place. She was maybe 15-17 which makes no sense to me. She had no clue what she was talking about with regards to their menu and did not really help me at all and seemed angry that I was asking so many questions. After I finally ordered she left for another employee to make my smoothie and even the employee joked and  said don’t worry we miss our manager too! I laughed but was also semi shocked by that. I Was a regular now I will not be back.

resp.text: Hey Marissa, we are so sorry you didn't have a good experience. While we strive to always be able to answer the questions our guests need, many times our team may have to reference a guide book to give the proper answer. I believe we are all a little rusty as we navigate opening back up after all the craziness hit. Our goal is to always be learning. Again, we are sorry you had a negative experience and we do hope to see you back in in the future. If you do decide to come back in (which we hope you do), your next one will be on us.

name: Brad Louis
text: This place has gone way downhill since they reopened. It was great when they first opened always had good service, so I don’t know what happened maybe they changed management.

name: Alda Her
text: I love this place ❤️🥰 they have wonderful juices, smoothies and salads!! Always the friendliest service and delicious, healthy food choices. My goal is to try EVERYTHING on the menu 😂

resp.text: Hello Alda, Thanks so much for the kind words and feedback. If you need some help choosing what to try next, let us know. We're happy to help.

name: Erika VM
text:
Im very disappointed. I’m in 50s and trying so hard to stay healthy and keep my mask on in public. Where I live in AL, today we had the highest COVID spike on record. None of your three servers had masks and looked oblivious to my question (polite) why they didn’t. We are in the middle of a pandemic. I stated this concern on their ig and they blocked me. As they say below, posting on their ig concerns is not in their opinion acceptable. As any business knows,  social media is where people can comment positive or negative concerns. If companies delete anything that is not glowing it shows a refusal to truly address customer concerns. Why not publicly state your official policies. Any successful co will allow feedback —good or bad— so long as it’s not vulgar.  This refusal to care about customers health,  and then to not reply reasonably to feedback is not acceptable. There is no admission in your reply to me that there is any policy re this public health matter. Im appalled as a franchise that you allow this and I’m quite upset. I was a regular but no more. It appears that teenagers unmasked are calling the shots. If you are in the food industry in AL and watching the news you need to realize that this is unsafe.These unmasked kids have parents and grandparents and can be asymptomatic and pass it on to them, others and your customers. The employee stated “we don’t have to wear them.”  You are now saying they do?? It’s not clear. Did you change your policies yesterday? Was the employee making that up? For a store that prides itself on health, this is the biggest health crisis we have faced as a country in many many years.
This was the Greystone store in AL .

resp.text: Hello Erika, Thank you so much for your feedback. I'm sure you're aware that an Instagram post about our new app isn't the best place to give feedback about masks. Thats why the comments were deleted. Thank you for bringing your feedback here. Our staff has been wearing masks for most of the time since we've reopened and we will continue to wear masks as long as people are concerned over this matter.

name: Leslie Dollar
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PLACE! Everything is fresh and delicious, very high quality ingredients.  Staff is super helpful and nice.  Fabulous addition to Greystone area.

resp.text: Hey Leslie, Thanks so much for your awesome feedback! We're super happy you came in and hope to see you again real soon.

name: Leah Velasco
text: AHHH there was a problem with my money and basically they were so nice and reassuring 😭😭😭😭😭 sweetest thing ever omg

name: Brian Smith
text: Jeremiah, Monique, and the team at Clean Juice are committed to building long term relationships with their customers by exceeding expectations and getting to know people. If you are looking to transform your health I recommend that you visit Clean Juice today!

name: William Atchley
text: Everything I've gotten has been great and taste so fresh!

name: Richard Bowman
text: Awesome fresh made juices and salads. Wonderful staff, knowledgeable and friendly.

resp.text: Hey Richard, Thanks so much for coming and providing such great feedback! We can't wait to see you again soon.

text: Our food was Great! The wings and salads was Very good. 🎩👒 off to the Chef and Hostess for Great customer service.  Remember you should hire people that are Great also just like your food. 😉

name: amber pierce
